name: Yui's Dungeon
description:
Welcome to Yui's Dungeon!

Beta Version: 0.8

Latest Release Date: 01/11/2023

You are the Reaper, traveling through realms to hunt and collect...

But Yui stalks you in every place you go and blocks your way with her various multi-dimensional dungeons plagued by the same minions, traps, and assaulters that progressively get stronger the longer her game goes.

The Reaper survives with their Soul Meter that allows them to escape each wave of her dungeons every time it gets maxed out. Yui's goal is to drain that meter empty and only then, she would leave you alone until you start another run.

There are AVATARS you can choose from to aid the Reaper with their respective skills and stats, CARDS that you can unlock and equip, an activated AURA that helps the Reaper fight, and Totems that boost your numbers.

To Yui, it's just a game. To Reapers, it's... well, a mild inconvenience.

Good luck!

This game is still in Beta and under development.

More features will be added in the future:

- More Avatars, more Realm Dungeon Variants, more Cards, Minions, and Upgrades.

- Bosses

- Quests

- Cosmetics and stylized effects for the Reaper (Store)

- Mini games (Reaper taking a break - playing poker, cooking, etc)
